props.name: testID
props.description: Test ID

props.name: theme
props.description: Specify theme properties to override specific styles for calendar parts

props.name: style
props.description: Specify style for calendar container element

props.name: headerStyle
props.description: Specify style for calendar header

props.name: customHeader
props.description: Allow rendering a totally custom header

props.name: initialDate
props.description: Initially visible month

props.name: minDate
props.description: Minimum date that can be selected, dates before minDate will be grayed out

props.name: maxDate
props.description: Maximum date that can be selected, dates after maxDate will be grayed out

props.name: allowSelectionOutOfRange
props.description: Whether to allow selection of dates before minDate or after maxDate

props.name: firstDay
props.description: If firstDay=1 week starts from Monday. Note that dayNames and dayNamesShort should still start from Sunday

props.name: markedDates
props.description: Collection of dates that have to be marked

props.name: displayLoadingIndicator
props.description: Whether to display loading indicator

props.name: showWeekNumbers
props.description: Whether to show weeks numbers

props.name: hideExtraDays
props.description: Whether to hide days of other months in the month page

props.name: showSixWeeks
props.description: Whether to always show six weeks on each month (when hideExtraDays = false)

props.name: disableMonthChange
props.description: Whether to disable changing month when click on days of other months (when hideExtraDays = false)

props.name: enableSwipeMonths
props.description: Whether to enable the option to swipe between months

props.name: disabledByDefault
props.description: Whether to disable days by default

props.name: disabledByWeekDays
props.description: Disable dates by days of the week (Sunday=0)

props.name: onDayPress
props.description: Handler which gets executed on day press

props.name: onDayLongPress
props.description: Handler which gets executed on day long press

props.name: onMonthChange
props.description: Handler which gets executed when month changes in calendar

props.name: onVisibleMonthsChange
props.description: Handler which gets executed when visible month changes in calendar

props.name: monthFormat
props.description: Month format for the header's title. Formatting values: http://arshaw.com/xdate/#Formatting

props.name: hideDayNames
props.description: Whether to hide the days names

props.name: hideArrows
props.description: Whether to hide the arrows

props.name: disableArrowLeft
props.description: Whether to disable the left arrow

props.name: disableArrowRight
props.description: Whether to disable the right arrow

props.name: renderArrow
props.description: Replace default arrows with custom ones (direction: 'left' | 'right')

props.name: onPressArrowLeft
props.description: Handler which gets executed when press left arrow. It receive a callback to go to the previous month

props.name: onPressArrowRight
props.description: Handler which gets executed when press right arrow. It receive a callback to go to the next month

props.name: disabledDaysIndexes
props.description: Whether to apply custom disable color to selected day names indexes

props.name: renderHeader
props.description: Replace default title with custom one

props.name: customHeaderTitle
props.description: Replace default title with custom element

props.name: dayComponent
props.description: Replace default day with custom day rendering component

props.name: disableAllTouchEventsForDisabledDays
props.description: Whether to disable all touch events for disabled days (can be override with 'disableTouchEvent' in 'markedDates')

props.name: disableAllTouchEventsForInactiveDays
props.description: Whether to disable all touch events for inactive days (can be override with 'disableTouchEvent' in 'markedDates')
